ygData.messageBody:
Message: 17
Date: Sun, 9 May 1999 21:15:18 -0800
From: "John Conway" <jconway@...>
Subject: CONCERNING LEVELS OF A PET

Ok, I am tired of hearing this. Ok I ALWAYS know what level of pet I have.
A general rule is the higher the level then they have all of the skills.
Ok first off we all understand that black/white is even and same level. Ok
well then you learn the second step is that yellow is one level above you.
But in actuallity when you get level 16ish or so yellow can mean 2 levels.
But at 16 I never get a yellow pet. I usually just get an even pet. Err
when I was 16. Well then I turned 17. So I know this. As you notice things
con blue when they are lower. Well in the lower levels there are pretty
much 2 basic blues

risky but upper hand
and risky but worth a try

Well upper hand means 2 levels below you and worth a try means one level
below you.

Now when I was level 15. My goal was this, to summon a upper hand pet.
Other stuff was green. Simple as that. Then I knew my pet was going to be a
level 12 pet. Simple. Now at level 16 it changes a bit. They add one more
blue and it goes like this..from lowest to highest..this is blue
conning..err 2 more..pardon me


risky but upper hand 3 levels below
risky but worth a try 2 levels below
risky but dangerous one level below

Now risky but dangerous is one level below and so forth. Though I believe
that insteafd of upper hand it says something "you should be able to..but
not certain" but ti is blue. I haven't paid much attnetion. I just always
know what my target con is. So you all people want a high level pet. Well
that is how to do it. I personally think it would be a waste of time to
have a spell to do it when they give us a way already. I don't need a spell
to con my pet. Well that is my 2 cents.

____________________________________________________________________________
______________
I added this for general reference

P.S Green more then 3 lv below you mostly dont attack unles attacked or
you sit near them.
White is same lv as you
Black 1 lv more than you ( im not shure on it buged?)
Yellow 2 lv more than you
Red 3 lv more than you



Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
